stories.title: Date Selection in Date Picker
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific date from the date picker so that I can enter date information accurately

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the date picker is open, When the user clicks on a date in the calendar, Then the input field should display the selected date in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format

stories.title: Time Slot Selection in Date Picker
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific time slot from the dropdown so that I can record the time correctly

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the time dropdown is visible, When the user selects a time slot, Then it should display the selected time next to the date in 'HH:MM AM/PM' format
